projects.title: Senior Trike Project
projects.description: Competition trike engineered and built end-to-end: CAD + FEA of a 4130/1018 steel frame, TIG welding & machining, drivetrain optimization, and DFM/DFA changes that cut assembly time and reduced BOM cost while preserving safety factors.

projects.title: Mechatronics Sensor Payload
projects.description: Multi-sensor payload for a UAV: IMU, temperature, and distance sensing; PWM motor/servo control; PID tuning to minimize overshoot; C++/Python logic; safe-states and telemetry validated in field tests.

projects.title: Autonomous Rescue Robot
projects.description: Autonomous ground robot that navigates to and retrieves targets using ultrasonic and IR sensing with a Python control stack. Modular hook/actuator, robust behaviors, and reliability proven on obstacle courses.

projects.title: Portfolio Website & Design System
projects.description: This responsive portfolio: accessible, mobile-first HTML/CSS/JS with JSON-driven sections and careful performance/semantics.
